thread.title: Jennifer Lopez picks Harry Styles over Zac Efron on Ellen | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez picks Harry Styles over Zac Efron on Ellen | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Jennifer Lopez picks Harry Styles over Zac Efron on Ellen | Daily Mail Online
text: comments She's a 47-year-old multihyphenate megastar, and he's a 23-year-old teen idol. Jennifer Lopez picks One Direction singer Harry Styles in a game of Would You Rather on The Ellen DeGeneres Show on Tuesday. She giggled that the handsome star was 'a little young for me', after being asked to play along by the talk show host, while she showcased her toned and tanned legs in the interviewees' chair. SCROLL DOWN FOR VIDEO Good choice: Jennifer Lopez turns out to be something of a fan of Harry Styles on Tuesday's Ellen show Ellen told the audience, 'She says she's single at the moment', which made J-Lo burst out laughing. The 59-year-old talk show host continued: 'She's too busy and doesn't have time for first dates and stuff,' as she set up the playful feature which displays the pictures of two hunks and asks for a choice between them. Demonstrating some playful mock-innocence, Jennifer asked: 'Who would you rather WHAT?' 'Well, you can decide,' retorted Ellen. Perfect: J-Lo, 47, picked the 23-year teen idol over a number of other hunks Who wouldn't? Her first decision was between Harry Styles and Zac Efron - who was shirtless in the displayed picture, she chose Harry Her first decision was between two heart-throbs, Harry Styles and Zac Efron - who was shirtless in the displayed picture. 'It's funny cos I could do either', J-Lo honestly replied, inspiring laughter from the audience. 'This is actually a very tough decision' she continued, 'Probably a couple of years ago I would have said Zac Efron, but now I'd say Harry Styles.' Plenty of attention: Ellen told the audience, 'She says she's single at the moment', which made J-Lo burst out laughing You choose! Demonstrating some playful mock-innocence, Jennifer asked: 'Who would you rather WHAT?' The game continued with a picture of Nick Jonas. 'I love Nick [Jonas], I know Nick, but I'm gonna have to stick with Harry Styles,' the Waiting For tonight singer admitted. Her next option was Bella Hadid's ex, and Selena Gomez's rumoured current beau, The Weeknd. 'Still Harry,' said Jennifer, decisively. Still Harry: The game continued with a picture of Nick Jonas Nope: Her next option was Bella Hadid's ex, and Selena Gomez's rumoured current beau, The Weeknd Tough choice: Harry beat off Brad Pitt too Harry squared: J-Lo decided that she preferred Styles over Meghan Markle's boyfriend Brad Pitt was her next deliberation, which saw the beauty pause before replying: 'Still Harry.' She went on to choose Harry Styles over Prince Harry and sounded for a moment like she might swap him out for Gwyneth Paltrow's ex, when shown a picture of Chris Martin. 'Hmmm, that's nice,' she mused, but then added: 'I'm still gonna say Harry Styles.' She finally chose Lenny Kravitz over Harry Styles - who makes his big screen debut in Dunkirk this year. Then Leonardo DiCaprio very quickly afterwards over Lenny. Leo then held his own over Big Sean, Ed Sheeran, Taye Diggs, Derek Hough and Jamie Foxx. It was Bruno Mars who ousted DiCaprio from J-Lo's affections. She then chose Bradley Cooper over Bruno. Coldplay shoulder: She sounded for a moment like she might swap him out for Gwyneth Paltrow's ex, when shown a picture of Chris Martin - but didn't Going his way: She finally chose Lenny Kravitz over Harry, then rapidly replaced him with Leonardo DiCaprio However, the Shades of Blue actress then she went back to Harry Styles as she picked him as her final choice over Bradley, although she giggled: 'He's a little bit young for me!' The entertainer was also asked about the rumours that she is dating Drake, who is younger than her. 'I don’t date younger men,' Jennifer told Ellen. 'It’s not like you have to be younger, ' she clarified, adding: 'It’s not about that. I just meet people and then if I go out with them, I go out with them. And if I like them, I like them. And if I don’t, I don’t. It’s about the person. It’s about who they are. It has nothing to do with age.' The World of Dance star also made it clear she still rules the stage in an Instagram post on Monday. She rocked a raunchy high-cut bodysuit in the sexy image, which she captioned JFTB - presumably referencing Jenny From The Block. Looking good: The World of Dance star rocked a raunchy high-cut bodysuit in a sexy post on Monday, which she captioned JFTB - presumably referencing Jenny From The Block Share or comment on this article 312
